title: The House of Chastisement
description: Fabien watches through the blind in his bedroom window as Christian goes for his daily jog. Although shy, he starts running in the hope of meeting the athlete he admires. A head-on collision between the two runners seals a new relationship. Christian remains cautious, he has just gone through a break-up and does not want to create too strong a bond for fear of being disappointed. Dominant, he doesn't give Fabien any orders, but suggests ways to act. Fabien, madly in love, obeys him in every way. Christian offers him a job at the House of Punishment, a place where his BDSM fantasies come true. Fabien becomes a computer scientist there. There he also undergoes the "erotic assaults" of his very hot boss. Which he doesn't fail to appreciate.Warning: This romance contains graphic erotica and elements of BDSM.
author: Danny Tyran
